hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Boomerang#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides #2 Deku Scrubs#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Arrows (30 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: Did you know that in the Forest Temple you can reach the alcove in the block push room with Hover Boots?

GC (Maze).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Water Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a #generic grotto#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #a Green Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #the Pocket Egg#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Green Poe Room Pot 2

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Eyedrops#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Arrows# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Goron Tunic#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that at the #bottom of Zora's Fountain# lies #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Gerudo Training Ground final reward# contains #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say Goron fabrics protect against more than fire.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that ##the Temple of Time## has #1# major item.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that ##Zora's River## has #3# major items.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Recovery Heart#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Zora Sapphire# and #a Green Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly Basement 2 Octoroks Pot 4

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.
